description: This is the target schema definition for the shopify SQL schema. It contains products, shops, orders, line_items and all inventory related tables. It also contains all foreign keys and indexes. The data structure is designed for react-flow with the attributes nodes and edges. inside of the objects the type definition is table, index or foreign_key. The nodes are the tables and the edges are the foreign keys and indexes. The nodes have the attributes id, type, data and position. The edges have the attributes id, source, target, type and animated. The position attribute is the position of the table in the react-flow graph. The data attribute is the table definition with the attributes name, columns and constraints. The columns attribute is an array of column definitions with the attributes name, type, primary_key, not_null, unique, default and foreign_key. The constraints attribute is an array of constraint definitions with the attributes name, type, columns and references. The type attribute is the type of the constraint. The columns attribute is an array of column names and the references attribute is the table name and the column name of the referenced table.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: app_id
columns.comment: The ID of the app that created the order.

columns.name: billing_address_address_1
columns.comment: The street address of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_address_2
columns.comment: An optional additional field for the street address of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_city
columns.comment: The city, town, or village of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_company
columns.comment: The company of the person associated with the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_country
columns.comment: The name of the country of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_country_code
columns.comment: The two-letter code (ISO 3166-1 format) for the country of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_first_name
columns.comment: The first name of the person associated with the payment method.

columns.name: billing_address_last_name
columns.comment: The last name of the person associated with the payment method.

columns.name: billing_address_latitude
columns.comment: The latitude of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_longitude
columns.comment: The longitude of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_name
columns.comment: The full name of the person associated with the payment method.

columns.name: billing_address_phone
columns.comment: The phone number at the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_province
columns.comment: The name of the region (province, state, prefecture, …) of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_province_code
columns.comment: The two-letter abbreviation of the region of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_zip
columns.comment: The postal code (zip, postcode, Eircode, …) of the billing address.

columns.name: browser_ip
columns.comment: The IP address of the browser used by the customer when they placed the order.

columns.name: buyer_accepts_marketing
columns.comment: Whether the customer consented to receive email updates from the shop.

columns.name: cancel_reason
columns.comment: The reason why the order was canceled.

columns.name: cancelled_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the order was canceled.

columns.name: cart_token
columns.comment: The ID of the cart that's associated with the order.

columns.name: closed_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the order was closed (archived).

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The autogenerated date and time when the order was created in Shopify.

columns.name: currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code for the shop currency.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.comment: The ID of the order's customer.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: The customer's email address.

columns.name: financial_status
columns.comment: The status of payments associated with the order. Can only be set when the order is created

columns.name: fulfillment_status
columns.comment: The order's status in terms of fulfilled line items.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID of the order, used for API purposes. This is different from the order_number property, which is the ID used by the shop owner and customer.

columns.name: landing_site_base_url
columns.comment: The URL for the page where the buyer landed when they entered the shop.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: The ID of the physical location where the order was processed.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: The order name, generated by combining the order_number property with the order prefix and suffix that are set in the merchant's general settings.

columns.name: note
columns.comment: An optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order.

columns.name: number
columns.comment: The order's position in the shop's count of orders. Numbers are sequential and start at 1.

columns.name: order_number
columns.comment: The order 's position in the shop's count of orders starting at 1001. Order numbers are sequential and start at 1001.

columns.name: processed_at
columns.comment: The date and time when an order was processed. This value is the date that appears on your orders and that's used in the analytic reports.

columns.name: referring_site
columns.comment: The website where the customer clicked a link to the shop.

columns.name: shipping_address_address_1
columns.comment: The street address of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_address_2
columns.comment: An optional additional field for the street address of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_city
columns.comment: The city, town, or village of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_company
columns.comment: The company of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_country
columns.comment: The name of the country of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_country_code
columns.comment: The two-letter code (ISO 3166-1 format) for the country of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_first_name
columns.comment: The first name of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_last_name
columns.comment: The last name of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_latitude
columns.comment: The latitude of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_longitude
columns.comment: The longitude of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_name
columns.comment: The full name of the person associated with the payment method.

columns.name: shipping_address_phone
columns.comment: The phone number at the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_province
columns.comment: The name of the region (province, state, prefecture, …) of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_province_code
columns.comment: The two-letter abbreviation of the region of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_zip
columns.comment: The postal code (zip, postcode, Eircode, …) of the shipping address.

columns.name: source_name
columns.comment: Where the order originated. Can be set only during order creation, and is not writeable afterwards.

columns.name: subtotal_price
columns.comment: The price of the order in the shop currency after discounts but before shipping, taxes, and tips in the shop currency.

columns.name: taxes_included
columns.comment: Whether taxes are included in the order subtotal.

columns.name: test
columns.comment: Whether this is a test order.

columns.name: token
columns.comment: A unique token for the order.

columns.name: total_discounts
columns.comment: The total discounts applied to the price of the order in the shop currency.

columns.name: total_line_items_price
columns.comment: The sum of all line item prices in the shop currency.

columns.name: total_price
columns.comment: The sum of all line item prices, discounts, shipping, taxes, and tips in the shop currency. Must be positive.

columns.name: total_tax
columns.comment: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order in th shop currency. Must be positive.

columns.name: total_weight
columns.comment: The sum of all line item weights in grams.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the order was last modified.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: The ID of the user logged into Shopify POS who processed the order, if applicable.

columns.name: checkout_token
columns.comment: A unique value when referencing the checkout that's associated with the order.

columns.name: confirmed
columns.comment: Whether inventory has been reserved for the order.

columns.name: customer_locale
columns.comment: A two-letter or three-letter language code, optionally followed by a region modifier.

columns.name: checkout_id
columns.comment: ID of the order's checkout.

columns.name: order_status_url
columns.comment: The URL pointing to the order status web page, if applicable.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: total_tip_received
columns.comment: The sum of all the tips in the order in the shop currency.

columns.name: device_id
columns.comment: The ID for the device.

columns.name: presentment_currency
columns.comment: The presentment currency that was used to display prices to the customer.

columns.name: total_shipping_price_set
columns.comment: The total shipping price set for the order in presentment and shop currencies.

columns.name: client_details_user_agent
columns.comment: Details of the browsing client, including software and operating versions.

columns.name: total_tax_set
columns.comment: The total tax applied to the order in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: total_shipping_price_set
columns.comment: The total shipping price of the order, excluding discounts and returns, in shop and presentment currencies. If taxes_included is set to true, then total_shipping_price_set includes taxes.

columns.name: total_discounts_set
columns.comment: The total discounts applied to the price of the order in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: total_line_items_price_set
columns.comment: The total of all line item prices in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: total_price_set
columns.comment: The total price of the order in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: is_confirmed
columns.comment: Whether the order is confirmed.

columns.name: source_identifier
columns.comment: The ID of the order placed on the originating platform. This value doesn't correspond to the Shopify ID that's generated from a completed draft.

columns.name: _fivetran_sycned
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: accepts_marketing
columns.comment: Whether the customer has consented to receive marketing material via email. Deprecated and will be coalesced with `email_marketing_consent_state`.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the customer was created.

columns.name: default_address_id
columns.comment: The default address for the customer.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: The unique email address of the customer. Attempting to assign the same email address to multiple customers returns an error.

columns.name: first_name
columns.comment: The customer's first name.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: A unique identifier for the customer.

columns.name: last_name
columns.comment: The customer's last name.

columns.name: orders_count
columns.comment: The number of orders associated with this customer.

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: The unique phone number (E.164 format) for this customer. Attempting to assign the same phone number to multiple customers returns an error.

columns.name: state
columns.comment: The state of the customer's account with a shop.

columns.name: tax_exempt
columns.comment: Whether the customer is exempt from paying taxes on their order. If true, then taxes won't be applied to an order at checkout. If false, then taxes will be applied at checkout.

columns.name: total_spent
columns.comment: The total amount of money that the customer has spent across their order history.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the customer information was last updated.

columns.name: verified_email
columns.comment: Whether the customer has verified their email address.

columns.name: email_marketing_consent_state
columns.comment: The current email marketing state for the customer. New version of `accepts_marketing` field.

columns.name: email_marketing_consent_opt_in_level
columns.comment: The marketing subscription opt-in level, as described in the M3AAWG Sender Best Common Practices, that the customer gave when they consented to receive marketing material by email. New version of `marketing_opt_in_level` field.

columns.name: email_marketing_consent_consent_updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the customer consented to receive marketing material by email. If no date is provided, then the date and time when the consent information was sent is used. New version of `accepts_marketing_updated_at` field.

columns.name: accepts_marketing_updated_at
columns.comment: Deprecated. The package will coalesce with `email_marketing_consent_consent_updated_at`.

columns.name: marketing_opt_in_level
columns.comment: Deprecated. The package will coalesce with `email_marketing_consent_opt_in_level`.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: note
columns.comment: A note about the customer.

columns.name: currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the currency that the customer used when they paid for their last order. Defaults to the shop currency. Returns the shop currency for test orders.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: fulfillable_quantity
columns.comment: The amount available to fulfill, calculated as follows: quantity - max(refunded_quantity, fulfilled_quantity) - pending_fulfilled_quantity - open_fulfilled_quantity

columns.name: fulfillment_status
columns.comment: How far along an order is in terms line items fulfilled.

columns.name: gift_card
columns.comment: Whether the item is a gift card. If true, then the item is not taxed or considered for shipping charges.

columns.name: grams
columns.comment: The weight of the item in grams.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID of the line item.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: The name of the product variant.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: The ID of the related order.

columns.name: price
columns.comment: The price of the item before discounts have been applied in the shop currency.

columns.name: product_id
columns.comment: The ID of the product that the line item belongs to. Can be null if the original product associated with the order is deleted at a later date.

columns.name: quantity
columns.comment: The number of items that were purchased.

columns.name: requires_shipping
columns.comment: Whether the item requires shipping.

columns.name: sku
columns.comment: The item's SKU (stock keeping unit).

columns.name: taxable
columns.comment: Whether the item was taxable.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The title of the product.

columns.name: total_discount
columns.comment: The total amount of the discount allocated to the line item in the shop currency.

columns.name: variant_id
columns.comment: The ID of the product variant.

columns.name: vendor
columns.comment: The name of the item's supplier.

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index of the order line.

columns.name: pre_tax_price
columns.comment: The pre tax price of the line item in shop currency.

columns.name: pre_tax_price_set
columns.comment: The pre tax price of the line item in shop currency and presentment currency.

columns.name: price_set
columns.comment: The price of the line item in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: tax_code
columns.comment: Tax code applied to the line item. As multiple taxes can apply to a line item, we recommend referring to `stg_shopify__tax_line`.

columns.name: total_discount_set
columns.comment: The total amount allocated to the line item in the presentment currency.

columns.name: variant_title
columns.comment: The title of the product variant.

columns.name: variant_inventory_management
columns.comment: The fulfillment service that tracks the number of items in stock for the product variant.

columns.name: properties
columns.comment: Line item properties.

columns.name: tax_code
columns.comment: Tax code applied to the line item. As multiple taxes can apply to a line item, we recommend referring to `stg_shopify__tax_line`.

columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The unique identifier of the line item in the refund.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: TThe unique identifier of the location where the items will be restockedBD

columns.name: order_line_id
columns.comment: The ID of the related line item in the order.

columns.name: quantity
columns.comment: The quantity of the associated line item that was returned.

columns.name: refund_id
columns.comment: The ID of the related refund.

columns.name: restock_type
columns.comment: How this refund line item affects inventory levels.

columns.name: subtotal
columns.comment: Subtotal amount of the order line refund in shop currency.

columns.name: total_tax
columns.comment: The total tax applied to the refund in shop currency.

columns.name: subtotal_set
columns.comment: The subtotal of the refund line item in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: total_tax_set
columns.comment: The total tax of the line item in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: subtotal_set
columns.comment: The subtotal of the refund line item in shop and presentment currencies.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: Whether the record has been deleted in the source system.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the product was created.

columns.name: handle
columns.comment: A unique human-friendly string for the product. Automatically generated from the product's title.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: An unsigned 64-bit integer that's used as a unique identifier for the product. Each id is unique across the Shopify system. No two products will have the same id, even if they're from different shops.

columns.name: product_type
columns.comment: A categorization for the product used for filtering and searching products.

columns.name: published_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was published. Can be set to null to unpublish the product from the Online Store channel.

columns.name: published_scope
columns.comment: Whether the product is published to the Point of Sale channel.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The name of the product.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the product was last modified.

columns.name: vendor
columns.comment: The name of the product's vendor.

columns.name: status
columns.comment: The status of the product. Valid values: - active: The product is ready to sell and is available to customers on the online store, sales channels, and apps. By default, existing products are set to active. - archived: The product is no longer being sold and isn't available to customers on sales channels and apps. - draft: The product isn't ready to sell and is unavailable to customers on sales channels and apps. By default, duplicated and unarchived products are set to draft.

columns.name: barcode
columns.comment: The barcode, UPC, or ISBN number for the product.

columns.name: compare_at_price
columns.comment: The original price of the item before an adjustment or a sale in shop currency.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product variant was created.

columns.name: fulfillment_service
columns.comment: The fulfillment service associated with the product variant.

columns.name: grams
columns.comment: The weight of the product variant in grams.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The unique numeric identifier for the product variant.

columns.name: image_id
columns.comment: The unique numeric identifier for a product's image. The image must be associated to the same product as the variant.

columns.name: inventory_item_id
columns.comment: The unique identifier for the inventory item, which is used in the Inventory API to query for inventory information.

columns.name: inventory_management
columns.comment: The fulfillment service that tracks the number of items in stock for the product variant.

columns.name: inventory_policy
columns.comment: Whether customers are allowed to place an order for the product variant when it's out of stock.

columns.name: inventory_quantity
columns.comment: An aggregate of inventory across all locations. To adjust inventory at a specific location, use the InventoryLevel resource.

columns.name: old_inventory_quantity
columns.comment: This property is deprecated. Use the InventoryLevel resource instead.

columns.name: option_1
columns.comment: The custom properties that a shop owner uses to define product variants. You can define three options for a product variant: option1, option2, option3.

columns.name: option_2
columns.comment: The custom properties that a shop owner uses to define product variants. You can define three options for a product variant: option1, option2, option3.

columns.name: option_3
columns.comment: The custom properties that a shop owner uses to define product variants. You can define three options for a product variant: option1, option2, option3.

columns.name: position
columns.comment: The order of the product variant in the list of product variants. The first position in the list is 1. The position of variants is indicated by the order in which they are listed.

columns.name: price
columns.comment: The price of the product variant in shop currency.

columns.name: product_id
columns.comment: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

columns.name: requires_shipping
columns.comment: This property is deprecated. Use the `requires_shipping` property on the InventoryItem resource instead.

columns.name: sku
columns.comment: A unique identifier for the product variant in the shop. Required in order to connect to a FulfillmentService.

columns.name: taxable
columns.comment: Whether a tax is charged when the product variant is sold.

columns.name: tax_code
columns.comment: This parameter applies only to the stores that have the Avalara AvaTax app installed. Specifies the Avalara tax code for the product variant.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The title of the product variant. The title field is a concatenation of the option1, option2, and option3 fields. You can only update title indirectly using the option fields.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the product variant was last modified. Gets returned in ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: weight
columns.comment: The weight of the product variant in the unit system specified with weight_unit.

columns.name: weight_unit
columns.comment: The unit of measurement that applies to the product variant's weight. If you don't specify a value for weight_unit, then the shop's default unit of measurement is applied. Valid values: g, kg, oz, and lb.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the transaction.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: The ID for the order that the transaction is associated with.

columns.name: refund_id
columns.comment: The ID associated with a refund in the refund table.

columns.name: amount
columns.comment: The amount of money included in the transaction.

columns.name: authorization
columns.comment: The authorization code associated with the transaction.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the transaction was created.

columns.name: processed_at
columns.comment: The date and time when a transaction was processed.

columns.name: device_id
columns.comment: The ID for the device.

columns.name: gateway
columns.comment: The name of the gateway the transaction was issued through.

columns.name: source_name
columns.comment: The origin of the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.comment: A string generated by the payment provider with additional information about why the transaction succeeded or failed.

columns.name: currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the currency used for the payment.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: The ID of the physical location where the transaction was processed.

columns.name: parent_id
columns.comment: The ID of an associated transaction.

columns.name: payment_avs_result_code
columns.comment: The response code from the address verification system.

columns.name: payment_credit_card_bin
columns.comment: The issuer identification number (IIN), formerly known as bank identification number (BIN) of the customer's credit card.

columns.name: payment_cvv_result_code
columns.comment: The response code from the credit card company indicating whether the customer entered the card security code, or card verification value, correctly.

columns.name: payment_credit_card_number
columns.comment: The customer's credit card number, with most of the leading digits redacted.

columns.name: payment_credit_card_company
columns.comment: The name of the company that issued the customer's credit card.

columns.name: kind
columns.comment: The transaction's type.

columns.name: receipt
columns.comment: A transaction receipt attached to the transaction by the gateway.

columns.name: currency_exchange_id
columns.comment: The ID of the adjustment.

columns.name: currency_exchange_adjustment
columns.comment: The difference between the amounts on the associated transaction and the parent transaction.

columns.name: currency_exchange_original_amount
columns.comment: The amount of the parent transaction in the shop currency.

columns.name: currency_exchange_final_amount
columns.comment: The amount of the associated transaction in the shop currency.

columns.name: currency_exchange_currency
columns.comment: The shop currency.

columns.name: error_code
columns.comment: A standardized error code, independent of the payment provider.

columns.name: status
columns.comment: The status of the transaction.

columns.name: test
columns.comment: Whether the transaction is a test transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: The ID for the user who was logged into the Shopify POS device when the order was processed, if applicable.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: authorization_expires_at

columns.name: processed_at

columns.name: note
columns.comment: User generated note attached to the refund.

columns.name: restock
columns.comment: Boolean indicating if the refund is a result of a restock.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: Reference to the user id which generated the refund.

columns.name: refund_id

columns.name: amount
columns.comment: Amount of the adjustment.

columns.name: tax_amount

columns.name: kind
columns.comment: The kind of order adjustment (eg. refund, restock, etc.).

columns.name: reason

columns.name: amount_set

columns.name: tax_amount_set

columns.name: billing_address_name
columns.comment: The full name of the person associated with the payment method.

columns.name: billing_address_phone

columns.name: billing_address_province

columns.name: billing_address_province_code
columns.comment: The two-letter abbreviation of the state or province of the billing address.

columns.name: billing_address_zip

columns.name: buyer_accepts_marketing
columns.comment: Whether the customer would like to receive email updates from the shop. This is set by the 'I want to receive occasional emails about new products, promotions and other news' checkbox during checkout.

columns.name: cart_token
columns.comment: The ID for the cart that's attached to the checkout.

columns.name: closed_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was closed. If the checkout was not closed, then this value is null.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was created.

columns.name: currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) of the shop's default currency at the time of checkout. For the currency that the customer used at checkout, see `presentment_currency`.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.comment: ID of the customer with the abandoned checkout.

columns.name: customer_locale
columns.comment: The two or three-letter language code, optionally followed by a region modifier. Example values - en, en-CA.

columns.name: device_id
columns.comment: The ID of the Shopify POS device that created the checkout.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: The customer's email address.

columns.name: gateway
columns.comment: The payment gateway used by the checkout.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the checkout.

columns.name: landing_site_base_url
columns.comment: The URL for the page where the customer entered the shop.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: The ID of the physical location where the checkout was processed.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Checkout order number.

columns.name: note
columns.comment: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order.

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: The customer's phone number for receiving SMS notifications.

columns.name: presentment_currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) of the currency that the customer used at checkout. For the shop's default currency, see `currency`.

columns.name: referring_site
columns.comment: The website that referred the customer to the shop.

columns.name: shipping_address_address_1
columns.comment: The street address of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_address_2
columns.comment: An optional additional field for the street address of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_city
columns.comment: The city of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_company
columns.comment: The company of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_country
columns.comment: The name of the country of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_country_code
columns.comment: The two-letter code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format) for the country of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_first_name
columns.comment: The first name of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_last_name
columns.comment: The last name of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_latitude
columns.comment: The latitude of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_longitude
columns.comment: The longitude of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_name
columns.comment: The full name of the person associated with the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_phone
columns.comment: The phone number at the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_province
columns.comment: The name of the state or province of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_province_code
columns.comment: The two-letter abbreviation of the state or province of the shipping address.

columns.name: shipping_address_zip
columns.comment: The zip or postal code of the shipping address.

columns.name: source_name
columns.comment: Where the checkout originated. Valid values include `web`, `pos`, `iphone`, `android`.

columns.name: subtotal_price
columns.comment: The price of the checkout in _presentment_ (customer) currency before shipping and taxes.

columns.name: taxes_included
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether taxes are included in the price.

columns.name: token
columns.comment: A unique ID for a checkout.

columns.name: total_discounts
columns.comment: The total amount of discounts to be applied in presentment currency.

columns.name: total_duties
columns.comment: The total duties of the checkout in presentment currency.

columns.name: total_line_items_price
columns.comment: The sum of the prices of all line items in the checkout in _presentment_ (customer) currency.

columns.name: total_price
columns.comment: The sum of line item prices, all discounts, shipping costs, and taxes for the checkout in _presentment_ (customer) currency.

columns.name: total_tax
columns.comment: The sum of all the taxes applied to the checkout in _presentment_ (customer) currency.

columns.name: total_weight
columns.comment: The sum of all the weights in grams of the line items in the checkout.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was last modified.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: The ID of the user who created the checkout.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: collection_id
columns.comment: ID referencing the `collection` the product belongs to.

columns.name: product_id
columns.comment: ID referencing the `product`.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: disjunctive
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the `rules` or disjuctive (logical `OR`) or not. True = disjuctive, false = conjunctive (logical `AND`).

columns.name: handle
columns.comment: A unique, human-readable string for the collection automatically generated from its title. This is used in themes by the Liquid templating language to refer to the collection.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the collection.

columns.name: published_at
columns.comment: The time and date (ISO 8601 format) when the collection was made visible. Returns null for a hidden collection.

columns.name: published_scope
columns.comment: Whether the collection is published to the Point of Sale channel. Valid values `web` (the collection is published to the Online Store channel but not published to the Point of Sale channel) and `global` (the collection is published to both the Online Store channel and the Point of Sale channel).

columns.name: rules
columns.comment: An array of rules that define what products go into the smart collection. Each rule (`column` -- `relation` --> `condition`) has these properties: - `column`: the property of a product being used to populate the smart collection. Ex: 'tag', 'type', 'vendor', 'variant_price', etc. - `relation`: The comparitive relationship between the column choice, and the condition ('equals', 'contains', 'greater_than', etc.) - condition: Select products for a smart collection using a condition. Values are either strings or numbers, depending on the relation value. See the [Shopify docs](https://shopify.dev/api/admin-rest/2022-10/resources/smartcollection#resource-object) for more.

columns.name: sort_order
columns.comment: The order of the products in the collection. Valid values inclide - `alpha-asc`: The products are sorted alphabetically from A to Z. - `alpha-des`: The products are sorted alphabetically from Z to A. - `best-selling`: The products are sorted by number of sales. - `created`: The products are sorted by the date they were created, from oldest to newest. - `created-desc`: The products are sorted by the date they were created, from newest to oldest. - `manual`: The products are manually sorted by the shop owner. - `price-asc`: The products are sorted by price from lowest to highest. - `price-desc`: The products are sorted by price from highest to lowest.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The name of the collection

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the collection was last modified.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index (starting from 1) represnting when the tag was placed on the customer.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.comment: ID of the customer being tagged.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: Value of the tag.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: code
columns.comment: The case-insensitive discount code that customers use at checkout. Shopify recommends this map onto the associated `price_rule.title`.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the discount code was created.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the discount code.

columns.name: price_rule_id
columns.comment: The ID for the price rule that this discount code belongs to.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the discount code was updated.

columns.name: usage_count
columns.comment: The number of times that the discount code has been redeemed.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the fulfillment was created. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the fulfillment.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: The unique identifier of the location that the fulfillment was processed at.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: The uniquely identifying fulfillment name, consisting of two parts separated by a .. The first part represents the order name and the second part represents the fulfillment number.  The fulfillment number automatically increments depending on how many fulfillments are in an order (e.g. #1001.1, #1001.2).

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: The unique numeric identifier for the order.

columns.name: receipt_authorization
columns.comment: The authorization code from the receipt.

columns.name: service
columns.comment: The fulfillment service associated with the fulfillment.

columns.name: shipment_status
columns.comment: The current shipment status of the fulfillment. Valid values include: - label_printed: A label for the shipment was purchased and printed. - label_purchased: A label for the shipment was purchased, but not printed. - attempted_delivery: Delivery of the shipment was attempted, but unable to be completed. - ready_for_pickup: The shipment is ready for pickup at a shipping depot. - confirmed: The carrier is aware of the shipment, but hasn't received it yet. - in_transit: The shipment is being transported between shipping facilities on the way to its destination. - out_for_delivery: The shipment is being delivered to its final destination. - delivered: The shipment was succesfully delivered. - failure: Something went wrong when pulling tracking information for the shipment, such as the tracking number was invalid or the shipment was canceled.

columns.name: status
columns.comment: The status of the fulfillment. Valid values include: - pending: Shopify has created the fulfillment and is waiting for the third-party fulfillment service to transition it to 'open' or 'success'. - open: The fulfillment has been acknowledged by the service and is in processing. - success: The fulfillment was successful. - cancelled: The fulfillment was cancelled. - error: There was an error with the fulfillment request. - failure: The fulfillment request failed.

columns.name: tracking_company
columns.comment: The name of the tracking company.

columns.name: tracking_number
columns.comment: Primary tracking number for the order.

columns.name: tracking_numbers
columns.comment: A list of tracking numbers, provided by the shipping company.

columns.name: tracking_urls
columns.comment: The URLs of tracking pages for the fulfillment.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the fulfillment was last modified.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: cost
columns.comment: The unit cost of the inventory item. The shop's default currency is used.

columns.name: country_code_of_origin
columns.comment: The country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) of where the item came from.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the inventory item was created.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID of the inventory item.

columns.name: province_code_of_origin
columns.comment: The province code (ISO 3166-2 alpha-2) of where the item came from. The province code is only used if the shipping provider for the inventory item is Canada Post.

columns.name: requires_shipping
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether a customer needs to provide a shipping address when placing an order containing the inventory item.

columns.name: sku
columns.comment: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the inventory item.

columns.name: tracked
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether inventory levels are tracked for the item. If true, then the inventory quantity changes are tracked by Shopify.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the inventory item was last modified.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: available
columns.comment: The available quantity of an inventory item at the inventory level's associated location. Returns null if the inventory item is not tracked.

columns.name: inventory_item_id
columns.comment: The ID of the inventory item associated with the inventory level.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: The ID of the location that the inventory level belongs to.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the inventory level was last modified.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: active
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the location is active. If true, then the location can be used to sell products, stock inventory, and fulfill orders.

columns.name: address_1
columns.comment: The location's street address.

columns.name: address_2
columns.comment: The optional second line of the location's street address.

columns.name: city
columns.comment: The city the location is in.

columns.name: country
columns.comment: The country the location is in (two-letter code).

columns.name: country_code
columns.comment: The two-letter code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format) corresponding to country the location is in.

columns.name: country_name
columns.comment: Full name of the location's country.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the location was created.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID of the location.

columns.name: legacy
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether this is a fulfillment service location. If true, then the location is a fulfillment service location.  If false, then the location was created by the merchant and isn't tied to a fulfillment service.

columns.name: localized_country_name
columns.comment: The localized name of the location's country.

columns.name: localized_province_name
columns.comment: The localized name of the location's region. Typically a province, state, or district.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: The name of the location.

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: The phone number of the location. This value can contain special characters, such as - or +.

columns.name: province
columns.comment: The province, state, or district of the location.

columns.name: province_code
columns.comment: The province, state, or district code (ISO 3166-2 alpha-2 format) of the location.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the location was last updated.

columns.name: zip
columns.comment: The zip or postal code.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the metafield was created.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: A description of the information that the metafield contains.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The unique ID of the metafield.

columns.name: key
columns.comment: The key of the metafield. Keys can be up to 64 characters long and can contain alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and periods.

columns.name: namespace
columns.comment: A container for a group of metafields. Grouping metafields within a namespace prevents your metafields from conflicting with other metafields with the same key name. Must have between 3-255 characters.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.comment: The unique ID of the resource that the metafield is attached to.

columns.name: owner_resource
columns.comment: The type of resource (table) that the metafield is attached to.

columns.name: type
columns.comment: The type of data that the metafield stores in the `value` field. Refer to the [list](https://shopify.dev/apps/metafields/types) of supported types. Use this instead of `value_type`.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the metafield was last updated.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: The data to store in the metafield. The value is always stored as a string, regardless of the metafield's type.

columns.name: value_type
columns.comment: DEPRECATED as of [June 2022](https://fivetran.com/docs/applications/shopify/changelog#june2022). Use `type` instead.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Name of the attribute.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: ID referencing the order the note attribute belongs to.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: Value of the attribute.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: carrier_identifier
columns.comment: A reference to the carrier service that provided the rate. Present when the rate was computed by a third-party carrier service.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: A reference to the shipping method.

columns.name: delivery_category
columns.comment: The general classification of the delivery method.

columns.name: discounted_price
columns.comment: The pre-tax shipping price with discounts applied in the shop currency.

columns.name: discounted_price_set
columns.comment: The pre-tax shipping price with discounts applied (JSON) in presentment and shop currencies.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: A globally-unique identifier.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: ID of the associated order.

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: The phone number at the shipping address.

columns.name: price
columns.comment: Returns the price of the shipping line in shop currency.

columns.name: price_set
columns.comment: Returns the price of the shipping line (JSON) in presentment and shop currencies.

columns.name: requested_fulfillment_service_id
columns.comment: The fulfillment service requested for the shipping method. Present if the shipping method requires processing by a third party fulfillment service.

columns.name: source
columns.comment: Returns the rate source for the shipping line.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: Returns the title of the shipping line.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index (from 1) representing the order of shipping lines per order.

columns.name: order_shipping_line_id
columns.comment: ID of the order shipping line this recod is associated with.

columns.name: price
columns.comment: The amount of tax, in shop currency, after discounts and before returns.

columns.name: price_set
columns.comment: The amount of tax, in shop and presentment currencies, after discounts and before returns (JSON).

columns.name: rate
columns.comment: The proportion of the line item price that the tax represents as a decimal.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The name of the tax.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index (starting from 1) represnting when the tag was placed on the order.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: ID of the order being tagged.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: Value of the tag.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: key
columns.comment: Key of the tag pair.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: ID of the order url being tagged.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: Value of the tag.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: allocation_limit
columns.comment: The number of times the discount can be allocated on the cart - if eligible. For example a Buy 1 hat Get 1 hat for free discount can be applied 3 times on a cart having more than 6 hats,  where maximum of 3 hats get discounted - if the allocation_limit is 3. Empty (null) allocation_limit means unlimited number of allocations.

columns.name: allocation_method
columns.comment: The allocation method of the price rule. Valid values include `each` (the discount is applied to each of the entitled items. For example, for a price rule that takes $15 off, each entitled line item in a checkout will be discounted by $15) and `across` (the calculated discount amount will be applied across the entitled items. For example, for a price rule that takes $15 off, the discount will be applied across all the entitled items).

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the price rule was created.

columns.name: customer_selection
columns.comment: The customer selection for the price rule. Valid values include `all` (the price rule is valid for all customers) and `prerequisite`  (the customer must either belong to one of the customer segments specified by customer_segment_prerequisite_ids, or be one of the customers specified by prerequisite_customer_ids).

columns.name: ends_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the price rule ends. Must be after starts_at.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the price rule.

columns.name: once_per_customer
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the generated discount code will be valid only for a single use per customer. This is tracked using customer ID.

columns.name: prerequisite_quantity_range
columns.comment: If `customer_selection` is `prerequisite`, the minimum number of items for the price rule to be applicable. The quantity of an entitled cart item must be greater than or equal to this value.

columns.name: prerequisite_shipping_price_range
columns.comment: If `customer_selection` is `prerequisite`, the maximum shipping price for the price rule to be applicable. The shipping price must be less than or equal to this value

columns.name: prerequisite_subtotal_range
columns.comment: If `customer_selection` is `prerequisite`, the minimum subtotal for the price rule to be applicable. The subtotal of the entitled cart items must be greater than or equal to this value for the discount to apply.

columns.name: prerequisite_to_entitlement_purchase_prerequisite_amount
columns.comment: If `customer_selection` is `prerequisite`, the prerequisite purchase for a Buy X Get Y discount. The minimum purchase amount required to be entitled to the discount.

columns.name: quantity_ratio_entitled_quantity
columns.comment: If `customer_selection` is `prerequisite`, in a Buy/Get ratio for a Buy X Get Y discount, this is the offered 'get' quantity.

columns.name: quantity_ratio_prerequisite_quantity
columns.comment: If `customer_selection` is `prerequisite`, in a Buy/Get ratio for a Buy X Get Y discount, this defines the necessary 'buy' quantity.

columns.name: starts_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the price rule starts.

columns.name: target_selection
columns.comment: The target selection method of the price rule. Valid values include `all` (the price rule applies the discount to all line items in the checkout) and  `entitled` (the price rule applies the discount to selected entitlements only).

columns.name: target_type
columns.comment: The target type that the price rule applies to. Valid values include `line_item` (the price rule applies to the cart's line items) and `shipping_line` (the price rule applies to the cart's shipping lines).

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The title of the price rule. This is used by the Shopify admin search to retrieve discounts. It is also displayed on the Discounts page of the Shopify admin for bulk discounts.  Shopify recommends that this map onto the associated `discount_code.code`.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the price rule was updated.

columns.name: usage_limit
columns.comment: The maximum number of times the price rule can be used, per discount code.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: The value of the price rule. If if the value of `target_type` is `shipping_line`, then only -100 is accepted. The value must be negative.

columns.name: value_type
columns.comment:
The value type of the price rule. Valid values include `fixed_amount` (applies a discount of value as a unit of the store's currency. For example, if value is -30 and the store's currency is USD, then $30 USD is deducted when the discount is applied) and `percentage` (applies a percentage discount of value. For example, if value is -30, then 30% will be deducted when the discount is applied).
If `target_type` is `shipping_line`, then only `percentage` is accepted.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the product image was created. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: height
columns.comment: Height dimension of the image which is determined on upload.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique numeric identifier of the product image.

columns.name: position
columns.comment: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the "main" image for the product.

columns.name: product_id
columns.comment: The id of the product associated with the image.

columns.name: src
columns.comment: Specifies the location of the product image. This parameter supports URL filters that you can use to retrieve modified copies of the image.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time when the product image was last modified. The API returns this value in ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: variant_ids
columns.comment: An array of variant ids associated with the image.

columns.name: width
columns.comment: Width dimension of the image which is determined on upload.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index (starting from 1) represnting when the tag was placed on the product.

columns.name: product_id
columns.comment: ID of the product being tagged.

columns.name: value
columns.comment: Value of the tag.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: address_1
columns.comment: The shop's street address.

columns.name: address_2
columns.comment: The optional second line of the shop's street address.

columns.name: checkout_api_supported
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the shop is capable of accepting payments directly through the Checkout API.

columns.name: city
columns.comment: The shop's city.

columns.name: cookie_consent_level
columns.comment: The cookie consent level defined on the shop's online store.

columns.name: country
columns.comment: The shop's country. In most cases, this value matches the country_code.

columns.name: country_code
columns.comment: The two-letter country code corresponding to the shop's country.

columns.name: country_name
columns.comment: The shop's normalized country name.

columns.name: county_taxes
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the shop is applying taxes on a per-county basis. Only applicable to shops based in the US. Either `true` or `null` (not false, according to Shopify API docs).

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601) when the shop was created.

columns.name: currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the shop's default currency.

columns.name: customer_email
columns.comment: The contact email used for communication between the shop owner and the customer.

columns.name: domain
columns.comment: The shop's domain.

columns.name: eligible_for_card_reader_giveaway
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the shop is eligible to receive a free credit card reader from Shopify.

columns.name: eligible_for_payments
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the shop is eligible to use Shopify Payments.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: The contact email used for communication between Shopify and the shop owner.

columns.name: enabled_presentment_currencies
columns.comment: An array of of enabled currencies (ISO 4217 format) that the shop accepts. Merchants can enable currencies from their Shopify Payments settings in the Shopify Admin.

columns.name: force_ssl
columns.comment: DEPRECATED.

columns.name: google_apps_domain
columns.comment: The GSuite URL for the store, if applicable.

columns.name: google_apps_login_enabled
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the GSuite login is enabled. Shops with this feature will be able to log in through the GSuite login page. Valid values are `true` and `null`.

columns.name: has_discounts
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether any active discounts exist for the shop.

columns.name: has_gift_cards
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether any active gift cards exist for the shop.

columns.name: has_storefront
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether this shop has an online store.

columns.name: iana_timezone
columns.comment: The name of the timezone assigned by the [IANA](https://www.iana.org/time-zones).

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID for the shop. A 64-bit unsigned integer.

columns.name: latitude
columns.comment: The latitude of the shop's location.

columns.name: longitude
columns.comment: The longitude of the shop's location.

columns.name: money_format
columns.comment: A string representing the way currency is formatted when the currency isn't specified.

columns.name: money_in_emails_format
columns.comment: A string representing the way currency is formatted in email notifications when the currency isn't specified.

columns.name: money_with_currency_format
columns.comment: A string representing the way currency is formatted when the currency is specified.

columns.name: money_with_currency_in_emails_format
columns.comment: A string representing the way currency is formatted in email notifications when the currency is specified.

columns.name: multi_location_enabled
columns.comment: DEPRECATED and hard-coded to `true`.

columns.name: myshopify_domain
columns.comment: The shop's .myshopify.com domain.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: The name of the shop.

columns.name: password_enabled
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the password protection page is enabled on the shop's online store.

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: The contact phone number for the shop.

columns.name: plan_display_name
columns.comment: The display name of the Shopify plan the shop is on.

columns.name: plan_name
columns.comment: The name of the Shopify plan the shop is on.

columns.name: pre_launch_enabled
columns.comment: Boolen representing whether the pre-launch page is enabled on the shop's online store.

columns.name: primary_locale
columns.comment: The shop's primary locale, as configured in the language settings of the shop's theme.

columns.name: primary_location_id
columns.comment: DEPRECATED. Formerly used for the ID of the shipping origin location.

columns.name: province
columns.comment: The shop's normalized province or state name.

columns.name: province_code
columns.comment: The two- or three-letter code for the shop's province or state.

columns.name: requires_extra_payments_agreement
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the shop requires an extra Shopify Payments agreement.

columns.name: setup_required
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether the shop has any outstanding setup steps.

columns.name: shop_owner
columns.comment: The username of the shop owner.

columns.name: source
columns.comment: The handle of the partner account that referred the merchant to Shopify, if applicable.

columns.name: tax_shipping
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether taxes are charged for shipping. Valid values are true or false.

columns.name: taxes_included
columns.comment: Boolean representing whether applicable taxes are included in product prices. Valid values are true or null.

columns.name: timezone
columns.comment: The name of the timezone the shop is in.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601) when the shop was last updated.

columns.name: weight_unit
columns.comment: The default unit of weight measurement for the shop.

columns.name: zip
columns.comment: The shop's zip or postal code.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: amount
columns.comment: The amount of the tender transaction in the shop's currency.

columns.name: currency
columns.comment: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the currency used for the tender transaction.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: The ID of the transaction.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: The ID of the order that the tender transaction belongs to.

columns.name: payment_method
columns.comment: Information about the payment method used for this transaction. Valid values include: - credit_card - cash - android_pay - apple_pay - google_pay - samsung_pay - shopify_pay - amazon - klarna - paypal - unknown - other

columns.name: processed_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the tender transaction was processed.

columns.name: remote_reference
columns.comment: The remote (gateway) reference associated with the tender.

columns.name: test
columns.comment: Whether the tender transaction is a test transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: The ID of the user logged into the Shopify POS device that processed the tender transaction, if applicable.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: amount
columns.comment: The amount of the discount in presentment currency.

columns.name: checkout_id
columns.comment: ID of the checkout.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: The discount code.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: When the checkout discount application was created.

columns.name: discount_id
columns.comment: ID of the discount. Deprecated, use `code` instead.

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index (from 1) representing the application of the discount to the checkout. Use the latest (highest index)

columns.name: type
columns.comment: The type of discount. Valid values - percentage, shipping, fixed_amount. (default - fixed_amount)

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: When the checkout's discount was last updated

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: amount
columns.comment: The amount that's deducted from the order total.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: This property returns the discount code that was entered at checkout. Otherwise this property returns the title of the discount that was applied.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: Associated order ID.

columns.name: type
columns.comment: The type of discount - `fixed_amount`, `percentage`, or `shipping`.

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Pairs with `order_id` to provide unique identifier for order discount code.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: carrier_identifier
columns.comment: A reference to the carrier service that provided the rate. Present when the rate was computed by a third-party carrier service.

columns.name: checkout_id
columns.comment: ID of the checkout that was abandoned.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: A reference to the shipping method.

columns.name: delivery_category
columns.comment: The general classification of the delivery method.

columns.name: delivery_expectation_range
columns.comment: Expected delivery date range.

columns.name: delivery_expectation_range_max
columns.comment: Latest expected delivery date.

columns.name: delivery_expectation_range_min
columns.comment: Earliest possible expected delivery date.

columns.name: delivery_expectation_type
columns.comment: Type of expected delivery.

columns.name: discounted_price
columns.comment: The pre-tax shipping price with discounts applied in _presentment_ (customer) currency.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique ID of the abandoned checkout shipping line.

columns.name: index
columns.comment: Index of the line amongst shipping lines for this checkout.

columns.name: original_shop_price
columns.comment: The pre-tax shipping price without any discounts applied in _presentment_ (customer) currency.

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: The phone number at the shipping address.

columns.name: price
columns.comment: The price of the shipping method in presentment currency.

columns.name: requested_fulfillment_service_id
columns.comment: The fulfillment service requested for the shipping method. Present if the shipping method requires processing by a third party fulfillment service.

columns.name: source
columns.comment: The channel where the checkout originated. Example value - shopify.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The title of the shipping method. Example value - International Shipping.

columns.name: _fivetran_deleted
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_deleted') }}

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: address_1
columns.comment: The street address where the fulfillment event occurred.

columns.name: city
columns.comment: The city where the fulfillment event occurred.

columns.name: country
columns.comment: The country where the fulfillment event occurred.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the fulfillment event was created.

columns.name: estimated_delivery_at
columns.comment: The estimated delivery date based on the fulfillment's tracking number, as long as it's provided by one of the following carriers: USPS, FedEx, UPS, or Canada Post (Canada only).  Value is `null` if no tracking number is available or if the tracking number is from an unsupported carrier. This property is available only when carrier calculated rates are in use.

columns.name: fulfillment_id
columns.comment: An ID for the fulfillment that's associated with the fulfillment event.

columns.name: happened_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the fulfillment event occurred.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: An ID for the fulfillment event.

columns.name: latitude
columns.comment: A geographic coordinate specifying the latitude of the fulfillment event.

columns.name: longitude
columns.comment: A geographic coordinate specifying the longitude of the fulfillment event.

columns.name: message
columns.comment: An arbitrary message describing the status. Can be provided by a shipping carrier.

columns.name: order_id
columns.comment: The ID of the order that's associated with the fulfillment event.

columns.name: province
columns.comment: The province where the fulfillment event occurred.

columns.name: shop_id
columns.comment: An ID for the shop that's associated with the fulfillment event.

columns.name: status
columns.comment: The status of the fulfillment event. Valid values: - label_printed: A label for the shipment was purchased and printed. - label_purchased: A label for the shipment was purchased, but not printed. - attempted_delivery: Delivery of the shipment was attempted, but unable to be completed. - ready_for_pickup: The shipment is ready for pickup at a shipping depot. - picked_up: The fulfillment was successfully picked up. - confirmed: The carrier is aware of the shipment, but hasn't received it yet. - in_transit: The shipment is being transported between shipping facilities on the way to its destination. - out_for_delivery: The shipment is being delivered to its final destination. - delivered: The shipment was successfully delivered. - failure: Something went wrong when pulling tracking information for the shipment, such as the tracking number was invalid or the shipment was canceled.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the fulfillment event was updated.

columns.name: zip
columns.comment: The zip code of the location where the fulfillment event occurred.

columns.name: _fivetran_synced
columns.comment: {{ doc('_fivetran_synced') }}

columns.name: index
columns.comment: The index of the tax line.

columns.name: order_line_id
columns.comment: The order line that this tax line is associated with.

columns.name: price
columns.comment: The amount of tax, in shop currency, after discounts and before returns.

columns.name: price_set
columns.comment: The amount of tax, in shop and presentment currencies, after discounts and before returns.

columns.name: rate
columns.comment: The proportion of the line item price that the tax represents as a decimal.

columns.name: title
columns.comment: The name of the tax.
